reviews.review: O jogo é legal quando jogado com amigos, porém pra mim se tornou muito repetitivo, é sempre a mesma coisa toda partida, com algumas diferenças de Killer, Pearks e mapa. Não é o tipo de jogo que eu me vejo jogando 1k de hora como um cszinho por exemplo.
I loooove playing this game. Its even more fun to play with friends, and more so than that in the dark with the volume up super high...

game has been a blast and new content updates have been pretty good even with the new ghost face killer!

This game is a lot of fun if you get the right mix of people in a match.  The killers are unique and fun, the survivors all roughly the same with a few special perks here and there.  Really at the end of the day it depends on the people you're matched with.  Some people in the community aren't great but that's the same with most online games.  I've found that if you're courteous and try not to make someone's round horrible, you usually end up with an enjoyable experience.

As a Killer: Your game, Your Rules
As a Survivor: Whine about them

dead by daylight, o game que deveria ser um jogo casual, se torna num aglomerado de erros, bugs e jogadores tóxicos que acham que o joguinho que eles tem 3k de horas é alguma coisa relevante. 

o game não tem polimento, nem é otimizável se vc tiver um pc mediano saiba que ele pode explodir a qualquer momento. 

matchmaking zoado, um dos motivos do pq eu vir refazer minha analise, eu como rank 7, e o killer rank 9, tinha no meio dos survivor's um rank 1 que provavelmente estava duo com alguém, zoando o killer por ele usar um perk (noed) por ser baby killer. sendo que o killer jogou bonitinho sem 'camp' e sem 'tunelar'. 

os jogadores inventam regras no game. vc como killer não pode camperar, existindo maneiras de jogar com esse tipo de estrategia. se vc não ''tunela'' algum survivor tu leva ''gen rush'' e não mata ninguém, se vc ''tunelar'' e capaz de levar rate no perfil. 

o game tem alguns killers ops como a Huntress que o machado que ela arremessa atravessa algumas estruturas.

os desenvolvedores demoram pra corrigir algum tipo de problema, o patch de atualização sai junto com novas skins e mais problemas pra variar. 

resumindo o game é um completo erro, onde os jogadores acham que são pro-players achando que o jogo deles é grande coisa onde na verdade é só uma maquina de Bugs e de fazer DLC's e Skins pra ter que fazer vc gastar mais dinheiro pra usufruir completamente da experiencia do jogo.

Eu particularmente gosto do tema do jogo de vc poder jogar com serial killers de filmes que eu gosto, mas sinceramente é um jogo que estressa mais que lol as vezes.

Edit - 31/03/2020 meu jogo acabou de crashar logo apos eu alcançar o lvl 47 do passe, quando fui abrir o inventario da Feng o item não estava la, como resolver isso? impossível, eles não respondem nenhum ticket  no suporte.
Jogo top top top top top top

GOOD:

Pretty fun playing both killer and survivor, Unique cast of characters for both sides with their own special abilities and perks. Bloodweb system is pretty good and matching for survivor is fast most of the time (Killer matchmaking takes a full decade to find a single match) . If you play long enough it will become more fun, but for new players its pretty hostile. Much mroe fun to play with friends, try playing private games with friends for new players getting into the game. Good luck :)


BAD:

I get put with people who have well over 1000 hours into the game while I dont even have 100 at the time of writing this review. The community is the most toxic thing ever. You will lose a game as killer and the survivors will then type in chat "ez win" while they're rank 6 (best rank is rank 1) and youre rank 18. The hitboxes are terrible most of the time and the pricing for characters is super high. Dont buy it if you dont like getting constantly shit on by people who have much more experience than you.

Overall I'd say the game is fun if youre willing to get past the bad parts at the beginning (first 100 hours) and reach the end of the rainbow where you can play without getting shit on by both survivors and killers.
Do popykania z kolegami (4) jako survivorzy lub samemu jako mordulec. Świetna zabawa podczas rozgrywki i różnorodność zdarzeń. Na przecenie jak najbardziej się opłaca.
супер игра, но есть недочёты, 8 из 10

The biggest problem of this game is matchmaking. You have 20lvl survivor and only 5 hours in this game? You'll play vs a killer with 2k hours and lvl5 and he'll rape everyone in your team because you all are lvl20-19

You want to play as a killer? pfft, you'll be tossed with your 10hours into a party of 3k hours players who will play with you like with a kitten.

Matchmaking in this piece of garbage is awful. Play it only with friends if you don't want your ass to be burnt

Hands down one of my favorite games. Dead by Daylight is one of those games that anybody can pickup and learn, but takes many hours and experience to excel in, or even master. Would highly recommend to any casual gamer or dedicated gamer. Survivor allows you to rely on teamwork and practice hiding from the killer and evading the killer. Killer is a lone wolf role where you have to find and chase survivors. 

*New players who read this* I would highly recommend playing survivor before killer so when you try to play killer you already know common loops, survivor perks, and common places survivors may hide.
O jogo é muito bom a dinâmica é legal, mas o jogo é estragado por hackers, campers e lag switch também existe muitos bugs tirando isso recomendo muito
Люблю эту игру так как есть где покакать
Matchmaking is broken but the game is still okay. Not worth paying full price, only purchase the game and DLC on sale.
Every patch killers are happens stronger. They always buff killers , Nerf survivors..

I've enjoyed this game, despite it's many flaws for a long time, always aware of how buggy it can be (but rarely running into these bugs myself).

However, devs spend very little time working on bugs (recent scandals of banning players who've made videos about said bugs to bring them to the limelight so they can be fixed).

This most recent patch, with their 3 year anniversary has made the game as broken as i've ever seen. Every other match involves one of the survivors unable to exit through the gate, Plague is now able to crash the game for everyone in the endgame, commonly survivors cannot struggle when picked up by the killer, lag and latency issues are still around, being hit while nowhere near the killer, survivors randomly losing connection in a match, and being unable to struggle on the 2nd hook meaning an instant death.

Without these major gamebreaking bugs I would really recommend this game, but in its current state I would dissuade anyone from paying for this.

Создатель мудачелла. Нахуя вы блять выпускаете обновы, в которых нерфите выживших. Ебаные твич нытики, играющие в соло только на маньяках нахуй не нужны в игре. Убрали осколок блять, красавчики. Я думаю мы проделали очень хорошую работу блять.
Gra bardzo fajna, nietypowy hide and seek, aczkolwiek wyraźnym minusem optymalizacja.
Direkt olarak P2W... Yani parası ile karakter alan bir kişiden kaçma şansınız sıfır gibi...

Ну в общем, хотелось бы поделиться первым взглядом об игре от рядового геймера, впечатления неоднозначные, но в большей степени негативные, сразу говорю что фана от игры за убийцу вы не получите, во всяком случае до тех пор пока не вкачаете по полной. Еще интересный момент заключается в том, что для того что бы собрать более менее вменяемый билд на одного из маньяков, вам будет необходимо так же прокачать 2-3 других до 35-40 лвл, а это для новичка поверьте задротство из малоприятных, учитывая что придется играть на первых уровнях против уже раскаченых сурвов. 

А это собственно отдельная тема, я ужасно бомбил с того что мне приходится играть против долбаных задротов с кучей наигранных часов, вообще как в этой игре реализована система подбора игр? почему я за своего 20 уровня мана играл против 12-10 ранговых сурвов? Так они еще умудрялись троллить меня в чате после матча, говоря о моей трешевости, видимо 2 моих открытых слота под навыки их совершенно не смущали, так они еще умудрялись сливаться. Посему игру удалил.
